Package game.enemies

Class Enemies

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.enemies.Enemies
All Implemented Interfaces:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, MarsAddOn, Capable, Printable, Resettable, Soul
Direct Known Subclasses:
LordOfCinder, Mimic, Skeleton, Undead
public abstract class Enemies
extends Actor
implements Soul, Resettable
Class representing the enemy
See Also:

    • isExist

      public boolean isExist​(GameMap map)
      A useful method to clean up the list of instances in the ResetManager class Overrides Resettable.isExist()
      Specified by:
      isExist in interface Resettable
      Parameters:
      map - the map the enemy is on
      Returns:
      the existence of the enemy in the game. for example, true to keep it permanent, or false if enemy needs to be removed from the reset list.
      See Also:
      Resettable.isExist(GameMap)
